Link

C.A.R.

Your Client Asset Repository of files produced during every sales cycle, to:

  • Improve visibility of tasks completed vs tasks remaining, with a goal of increasing win rate through technical excellence
  • Simplify peer to peer knowledge sharing and reducing hours spent “recreating the wheel”
  • Optimize the hours spent cadencing with leadership

POC Guidance

Minimize delays and maximize client engagement. This page acts as guidance on how to navigate the approval process for a IBM Cloud POC environment with respect to our strategic sales plays.

Link

Business Partners

A list detailing our authorized IBM Business Partners for the resale of IBM Cloud products and services. These partners significantly contribute to our ecosystem by also offering their own managed services and, in some cases, by developing proprietary tile offerings leveraging our core technologies.
